column2: §PED-EP: Enable Encourage Pregnancy§!
The "§MED-EP: Encourage Pregnancy§!" decision will be enabled on all targets
§PED-EP: Disable Encourage Pregnancy§!
The "§MED-EP: Encourage Pregnancy§!" decision will be disabled (until re-enabled by taking the "§PED-EP: Enable Encourage Pregnancy§!" decision)
§MED-EP: Encourage Pregnancy§!
Encourage §Y[Root.GetBestName]§! to become pregnant
§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! will attempt to become pregnant by her §Ghusband §Y[FromFrom.GetBestName]§! at a random time in the future (depending on their current fertility).
§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! will attempt to become pregnant by her §Gconsort §Y[FromFrom.GetBestName]§! at a random time in the future (depending on their current fertility).

§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! will attempt to become pregnant by her §Rlover §Y[FromFrom.GetBestName]§! at a random time in the future (depending on their current fertility).\n§RWARNING! The child may be illegitimate!§!
§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! will attempt to become pregnant by §Y[FromFrom.GetBestName]§! at a random time in the future (depending on their current fertility).
§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! has NOT already been encouraged to become pregnant
§MED-EP: Encourage Pregnancy§! has NOT been temporarily blocked for §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! (by self-targeted decision)
§Y[FromFrom.GetBestName]§! is §Ghusband§! of §Y[Root.GetBestName]§!
§Y[FromFrom.GetBestName]§! is §Gconsort§! of §Y[Root.GetBestName]§!\n§g...INFO: Children of consorts have a lifetime -1 diplomacy modifier
§Y[FromFrom.GetBestName]§! is §Glover§! of §Y[Root.GetBestName]§!\n§g...INFO: Lovers have doubled fertility§!
§Y[FromFrom.GetBestName]§! is §Rlover§! of §Y[Root.GetBestName]§!\n§g...INFO: Lovers have doubled fertility, but the child may be illegitimate§!
§Y[FromFrom.GetBestName]§! has §Ghigh fertility§!
§Y[FromFrom.GetBestName]§! has §Gvery high fertility§!
§Y[FromFrom.GetBestName]§! has §Rlow fertility§!
§Y[FromFrom.GetBestName]§! has §Rvery low fertility§!
§RED-EP: Enable Debug Mode§!
§RED-EP: Disable Debug Mode§!

Enable debug mode for the "§MED-EP: Encourage Pregnancy§!" targeted decision.
-
Notable features:
-
You will receive events when the event that MIGHT trigger the pregnancy eventually occurs
-
expd_trigger_pregnancy_score will not be cleared, and will be visible if you enable CK2's debug_mode.
Disable debug mode for the "§MED-EP: Encourage Pregnancy§!" targeted decision.
§RED-EP: Enable Instant Pregnancy§!
§RED-EP: Disable Instant Pregnancy§!
§RDEBUG MODE:§! The "§MED-EP: Encourage Pregnancy§!" targeted decision will now attempt to trigger pregnancy instantly.
§RDEBUG MODE:§! The "§MED-EP: Encourage Pregnancy§!" targeted decision will now attempt trigger pregnancy after the usual delay.
§RED-EP: Cancel Encouragement§!

§RDEBUG MODE:§! The encouraged pregnancy between §Y[Root.GetBestName]§! and §Y[Root.expd_preg_triggered_pregnancy_father.GetBestName]§! that was encouraged by §Y[Root.expd_preg_triggered_pregnancy_triggerer.GetBestName]§! will be cancelled.
I have become pregnant with the child of [From.expd_preg_triggered_pregnancy_father.GetBestName], thanks to your encouragement.
Despite your encouragement, I was not able to become pregnant with [From.expd_preg_triggered_pregnancy_father.GetBestName]'s child.

Thank you for encouraging me to become pregnant with [From.expd_preg_triggered_pregnancy_father.GetBestName]'s child. However, as it turns out, I did not need that encouragement - I have become pregnant on my own.
OK
§RDEBUG MODE:§! §Y[Root.GetBestName]§! will attempt to become pregnant by her §Ghusband §Y[FromFrom.GetBestName]§! IMMEDIATELY (via the custom event)
§RDEBUG MODE:§! §Y[Root.GetBestName]§! will attempt to become pregnant by her §Gconsort §Y[FromFrom.GetBestName]§! IMMEDIATELY (via the custom event)
§RDEBUG MODE:§! §Y[Root.GetBestName]§! will attempt to become pregnant by her §Rlover §Y[FromFrom.GetBestName]§! IMMEDIATELY (via the custom event)
§RDEBUG MODE:§! §Y[Root.GetBestName]§! will attempt to become pregnant by §Y[FromFrom.GetBestName]§! IMMEDIATELY (via the custom event)
